_header: He that all thing doth well
_description: A tag, translating ‘Tota die laudat qui omnia bene agit’, here attributed to Augustine — one couplet in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
He þat alle þing doth welHis preyȝere is herd
                    eueridel
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 7.
